emails.subject: RE: Follow up call with Savola-Dnext
emails.cc: John Stansfield; Mohamed Elasfoury; Camila Baldin; Support Dnext; Guillaume Goudy
emails.body_text:
Dear Abdullah,

 

I hope this email finds you well.

 

My name is Saber, and I am part of the DNEXT support team. It's a pleasure to connect with you.

 

I’m happy to inform you that we have set up a trial environment for you and created a user account. The login credentials and additional details have been sent to your inbox privately.

 

We would love to arrange a demo session where we can guide you through the platform and its main features, ensuring that you get the most out of the experience. 

 

Please let us know a time that works best for you, and we will be happy to accommodate.

 

Looking forward to hearing from you.

 

Best regards,

Saber Khalfallah

Customer Support

                                                                                                     saber.khalfallah@dnext.io <mailto:saber.khalfallah@dnext.io> 



 

 

DNEXT INTELLIGENCE SA | Avenue Louis-Casaï 81 | CH-1216 Cointrin

info@dnext.io <mailto:info@dnext.io>  | www.dnext.io <http://www.dnext.io/> 

 

 

From: Guillaume Goudy <guillaume.goudy@dnext.io> 
Sent: Tuesday, January 27, 2026 17:53
To: Abdullah Basudan <abasudan@savola.com>
Cc: John Stansfield <john.stansfield@dnext.io>; Mohamed Elasfoury <mohamed.elasfoury@dnext.io>; Camila Baldin <camila.baldin@dnext.io>; Support Dnext <support@dnext.io>
Subject: RE: Follow up call with Savola-Dnext

 

Hello Abdullah,

 

Hope all is well. You should receive your platform credentials tonight or tomorrow. I am adding John so he can organize a market call with you and send you, his report.

On the platform, you will need support desk to help you navigate in the platform. It requires on boarding. Do not hesitate to use them

Best Regards,

gg

emails.body_html:
Dear Abdullah,

 

I hope this email finds you well.

 

My name is Saber, and I am part of the DNEXT support team. It's a pleasure to connect with you.

 

I’m happy to inform you that we have set up a trial environment for you and created a user account. The login credentials and additional details have been sent to your inbox privately.

 

We would love to arrange a demo session where we can guide you through the platform and its main features, ensuring that you get the most out of the experience.

 

Please let us know a time that works best for you, and we will be happy to accommodate.

 

Looking forward to hearing from you.

 

Best regards,

Saber Khalfallah

Customer Support

                                                                                                     saber.khalfallah@dnext.io

 

 

DNEXT INTELLIGENCE SA | Avenue Louis-Casaï 81 | CH-1216 Cointrin

info@dnext.io | www.dnext.io

Sent: Tuesday, January 27, 2026 17:53
To: Abdullah Basudan <abasudan@savola.com>
Cc: John Stansfield <john.stansfield@dnext.io>; Mohamed Elasfoury <mohamed.elasfoury@dnext.io>; Camila Baldin <camila.baldin@dnext.io>; Support Dnext <support@dnext.io>
Subject: RE: Follow up call with Savola-Dnext

 

Hello Abdullah,

 

Hope all is well. You should receive your platform credentials tonight or tomorrow. I am adding John so he can organize a market call with you and send you, his report.

On the platform, you will need support desk to help you navigate in the platform. It requires on boarding. Do not hesitate to use them

Best Regards,

gg
